column4:
iqloo@Biasville:/etc/gtk$ linux32 /usr/local/firefox32/firefox
2006-11-26T14:28:00.000Z	iqloo		/usr/local/firefox32/firefox-bin: error while loading shared libraries: libgtk-x11-2.0.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory The entire chunk.
I would recommend you just download firefox 32 into ~/iqloo/firefox and run it from there, works well for me here
